title: Literature Review of Defects in MAPbI3/Br3
text: Density Functional Calculations of Native Defects in CH3NH3PbI3: Effects of Spinâˆ’Orbit Coupling and Self-Interaction ErrorAuthor: Mao-Hua DuYear: 2015Defect: V_I, I_i, I_MA, Pb_i, Pb_MAMethod: GGA_noSOC, GGA_SOC, HSE_SOCPhase: betaSuper cell: 2x2x1 (16 formal units)Main Results: GGA-noSOC raises both VBM and CBM Only iodine and its complexes (I_MA) induce deep electron and hole trapping levels inside the bandgapShallow halogen vacancies in halide optoelectronic materialsAuthor: Hongliang Shi and Mao-Hua DuYear: 2014Defect: Halogen vacancyMethod: GGA_noSOC, HSE_SOCMaterials: CH3NH3PbI3,CH3NH3SnI3, CsPbBr3Main Results: All have shallow halogen vacancies Insufficient orbital hybridization around the vacancy due to large cation-cation distances and low anion coordination numbers and those with crystal symmetry that prevents strong hybridization of cation dangling bond orbitals. chemistry of ns2 ions

title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
